comments.body: Sorry, I'd reorder the doc to match the order in the interface :)

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +41,45 @@      name: Optional name prefix for the operations created when applying
        gradients.  Defaults to "Momentum".
      use_nesterov: If `True` use Nesterov Momentum.
        See [Sutskever et. al., 2013](
        http://jmlr.org/proceedings/papers/v28/sutskever13.pdf)
